script.title: SDF Download
script.description: Download SDF reports into a BigQuery table.
instructions: Select your filter types and the filter ideas.
Enter the file types using commas.
SDF_ will be prefixed to all tables and date appended to daily tables.
File types take the following format: FILE_TYPE_CAMPAIGN, FILE_TYPE_AD_GROUP,...

field.name: dataset
field.description: Dataset to be written to in BigQuery.

field.name: version
field.description: The sdf version to be returned.

field.name: filter_type
field.description: The filter type for the filter ids.

field.name: filter_ids
field.description: Comma separated list of filter ids for the request.

field.name: time_partitioned_table
field.description: Is the end table a time partitioned

field.name: create_single_day_table
field.description: Would you like a separate table for each day? This will result in an extra table each day and the end table with the most up to date SDF.

field.name: dataset
field.description: Dataset to be written to in BigQuery.

field.name: table_suffix
field.description: Optional: Suffix string to put at the end of the table name (Must contain alphanumeric or underscores)
